content: How do folks map the HL7 V2 Table 0119 (Order Control Codes) to the MedicationRequest.status property (the MedicationRequestStatus http://hl7.org/fhir/medication-request-status system)? Obviously the 0119 table has many more codes than the MedicationRequestStatus codes; but it's non-obvious how to map the V2 0119 codes into this set?
